name: PublicKeyCredentialRequestOptions.rpId
description: The rpId property, of the PublicKeyCredentialRequestOptions dictionary, is an optional property which indicates the relying party's identifier as a USVString. Its value can only be a suffix of the current origin's domain. For example, if you are browsing on foo.example.com, the rpId value may be "example.com" but not "bar.org" or "baz.example.com".

refs.name: Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
refs.description: rpId - Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
